# IB Interface

An adaption of [ib-insync](https://github.com/erdewit/ib_insync) for The Interactive Brokers Python TWS API.
 
## Installation

```python
pip install ib-interface
```

## Usage

See `notebooks` for examples in Jupyter notebooks.
